name: uce-highlight
description: A component that helps editing and highlighting code on a page.

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run rollup:es && npm run rollup:babel && drop-babel-typeof ./index.js && npm run min && npm run fix:default
scripts.rollup:es: rollup --config rollup/es.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /window./' es.js && rm -rf es.js.bck
scripts.rollup:babel: rollup --config rollup/babel.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /window./' index.js && rm -rf index.js.bck
scripts.fix:default: sed -i 's/({})/({}).default/' index.js && sed -i 's/({})/({}).default/' es.js && sed -i 's/({})/({}).default/' min.js

author: Andrea Giammarchi
